info.title: Domain API
info.description: An API to return subdomains or whois query of requested domain

get.description: Returns whois query of the requested domain.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain which is requested its whois query.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
What fields of the whois query the api will return. Should be separated by commas.
Example: registrar,creation_date,expiration_date

200.description: Whois query of the requested domain

get.description: Returns subdomains of the requested domain.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain which is requested its subdomains.
